name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging my extensive skills in **AWS**, **Automation**, **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform** and **Ansible**, and **CI/CD** best practices to build secure and scalable solutions. I have a solid foundation in **Security Best Practices**, including **API Security** and **Application Security**, and I am proficient in system administration on **Linux** platforms, including **Debian**. My technical expertise also encompasses **Go**, **Python**, and **Bash**, ensuring that I can contribute effectively across multiple layers of the development stack.

I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade applications within the healthcare and financial sectors while implementing modern technologies such as **Full Stack Development** with **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience extends to advanced cloud infrastructure management with **AWS**, integrating machine learning capabilities for predictive analytics, and building microservices that adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My strengths in critical thinking, collaboration, and an ownership mindset drive performance and reliability in distributed systems and server administration, allowing me to tackle complex challenges effectively.
